<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Doctor's Visitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=6374) <actions string="Single Action or Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 208 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=257)

**Prerequisites**
[Medic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6373)

</column>

---

You move to provide immediate care to those who need it. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305), then use [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=5125) or [Treat Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=2398). You can spend 2 actions for Doctor’s Visitation to instead Stride and then use either [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2396) or [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=6375) (if you have that feat).
name: Doctor's Visitation
